page.title: 08Sports Clubs in Malmesbury
page.content: {Malmesbury Cricket Club}is one of the best in Wiltshire, and has a lovely ground overlooking the Abbey. The first team is{top of the Western {League}at the present time. There are Under 13 and Under 14 teams, and practice sessions every Thursday evening. {Malmesbury Tennis Club}on Tetbury Hill has{three shale courts,}and enters about five teams in the {Chippenham League.}There are practice nights for juniors as well as club nights for adults. {Malmesbury Marlins}is a swimming club with fifty five members. They use the pools at Cirencester, Westonbirt and Burton Hill, as well as the open air pool in Malmesbury. There is a very popular bowls club in Malmesbury, and also opportunities for{many other activities.
